entry.title: WIND WARNING , St. Anthony
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Anthony Airport 7:11 PM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: -0.5°C
Wind: ESE 50 km/h gust 61 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain or freezing rain ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 along parts of the coast early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 this evening then southwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 6:01 PM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
